alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Las Animas County through 445 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Trinchera to near Branson. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Branson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
